How to edit your profile?
How to reset my password
Log out of your account
How do I search for something within a section
How emergency locator access my location
How can I join the workshop?
What is this app for?
How can I benefited from this app?
Is my personal data secured?
How frequent is the content in this app updated?

1. Navigate to profile section
2. Click the edit button
3. Update your profile data
4. Press update

1. Navigate to setting section
2. Search for change password
3. Update your password.
4. Follow the prompt and email confirmation
1. Navigate to setting section\n2. Search for log out
- A search bar is contained within the top of searchable contents
- Only accurate location are perceived from devices when the emergency locator is accessed, we do not collect user\'s location for malicious purpose.
- Social market and E-learning modules do provide workshop to enhance knowledge
- This app is primarily as an initiative to achieve SDG 5 goals as well as to promote gender equality
- Gender doesn\'t matter. However females will find useful resources accessible in our app.
- Yes, your data is stored within a secured database. Unauthorized third party will not gain access to the data and we are responsible to keep safe of our data.
- The content of HerJourney is updated weekly.
